block_text.room_desc:
Offering city views, air-conditioned rooms are furnished with a wardrobe, in-room safe, a flat-screen cable/satellite TV and sofa seating area. Mini-bar and tea/coffee making facilities are also included. The private bathroom comes with a bathtub, separate shower, bathrobes and hairdryer.

Guests enjoy access to the Club Lounge on Floor 59. Complimentary benefits include:
- Personalized express check-in and check-out
- Welcome drink and fruit basket
- Internet access and use of computers
- Printing service up to 20 pages per stay (excluding color prints)
- Complimentary incoming fax and local calls (excluding mobile calls)
- Tea, coffee, soft drinks, mineral water from 06:00 to 22:00
- Afternoon tea time from 14:30 to 16:30
- Evening cocktail from 17:30 to 19:30
- 10% discount on laundry service
- 1-hour use of meeting room per day (subject to availability, advance reservation required)
- Late check-out until 16:00 (subject to availability)

Please note that due to the nature of the Club Lounge, guests must be at least 12 years old to gain access and entry.

block_text.room_desc: Offering city views, air-conditioned suites are furnished with a wardrobe, in-room safe, a flat-screen cable/satellite TV and sofa seating area. Mini-bar and tea/coffee making facilities are also included. The private bathroom comes with a bathtub, separate shower, bathrobes and hairdryer.

block.mealplan: Continental breakfast is included in the room rate.
block.name: Junior King Suite

policies.content: Note that if canceled, modified, or in case of no-show, the total price of the reservation will be charged.
You'll be charged a prepayment of the total price of the reservation in the 2 days before arrival.

block_text.room_desc:
Offering city views, air-conditioned rooms are furnished with a wardrobe, in-room safe, a flat-screen cable/satellite TV and sofa seating area. Mini-bar and tea/coffee making facilities are also included. The private bathroom comes with a bathtub, separate shower, bathrobes and hairdryer.

Guests enjoy access to the Club Lounge on Floor 59. Complimentary benefits include:
- Personalized express check-in and check-out
- Welcome drink and fruit basket
- Internet access and use of computers
- Printing service up to 20 pages per stay (excluding color prints)
- Complimentary incoming fax and local calls (excluding mobile calls)
- Tea, coffee, soft drinks, mineral water from 06:00 to 22:00
- Afternoon tea time from 14:30 to 16:30
- Evening cocktail from 17:30 to 19:30
- 10% discount on laundry service
- 1-hour use of meeting room per day (subject to availability, advance reservation required)
- Late check-out until 16:00 (subject to availability)

Please note that due to the nature of the Club Lounge, guests must be at least 12 years old to gain access and entry.

action_modal.details: For bookings made on or after April 6, 2020, be sure to consider the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) and associated government measures. If you don’t book a flexible rate, you may not be entitled to a refund. Your cancellation request will be handled by the property, based on your chosen policy and consumer law where applicable. During times of uncertainty, we recommend booking an option with free cancellation. If your plans change, you can cancel free of charge until free cancellation expires.
action_modal.title: Check your booking conditions

banner.subtitle: Starting April 6, 2020, your chosen cancellation policy will apply, regardless of the coronavirus. We recommend booking an option with free cancellation in case your travel plans change.
banner.title: Find a cancellation policy that works for you

hotel_text.important_information:
Please note that due to the nature of the Club Lounge, guests must be at least 12 years old to gain access and entry.

Please inform Lotte Hotel Hanoi of your expected arrival time in advance. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly using the contact details in your confirmation.

policies.content: You can cancel free of charge until 2 days before arrival. You'll be charged the total price of the reservation if you cancel in the 2 days before arrival.

All children are welcome. Up to two children under 6 years stay free of charge when using existing beds.
Up to two children from 6 to 12 year are charged  VND 352500 per night when using existing beds.
One child under 4 years stays free of charge in a crib.
One older child or adult is charged VND 1085700  per night in an extra bed.
The maximum number of extra beds in a room is 1.
The maximum number of total guests in a room is 4.
The maximum number of cribs in a room is 1.
Any type of extra bed or crib is upon request and needs to be confirmed by management.
Additional fees are not calculated automatically in the total cost and will have to be paid for separately during your stay.
WiFi is available in all areas and is free of charge.
Free public parking is available  on site (reservation is needed).
You'll be charged a prepayment of the total price of the reservation in the 2 days before arrival.
The property reserves the right to pre-authorize credit cards prior to arrival.
10 % VAT is included. 5 % Service charge is included. A City tax is not applicable.
items: A City tax is not applicable.

messages: Check for travel restrictions. Travel might only be permitted for certain purposes, and touristic travel in particular may not be allowed.
info_banners.title: Coronavirus (COVID-19) support
